main.name: Deniz Jasarbasic
main.occupation: high school student, future data scientist, and technologie enthusiast
main.description: In September of 2021, I will be beginning my next learning adventure at the University of Ottawa. I will be studying Computer Science and will be specializing in Data Science. I can't wait to begin
main.bio: Hi my name is Deniz Jasarbasic. I love programming, contributing to the CS community, and enjoy building impactful side projects. Feel free to connect with me and check out my projects below. I am always looking to connect, chat, and meet new people everyday!
main.contactmessage: Intrested in my projects, skills, or ideas? Feel free to contact me. I am always looking to connect, chat, and meet new people everyday!

education.degree: Honours BSc in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science
education.description: • Youngest volunteer at Ottawa's largest hackathon, uOttaHack throughout High School.

education.description1: • Honors in the French Immersion Program.

projects.title: Project Manager and Lead Data Scientist
projects.description: My team and I conducted and published a four-month group research project and study. We used many large data sets (Big Data) to show the correlations of how education funding systems can affect the success of students. Using this data we presented some novel solutions about funding that can benefit the success of students using the integrative thinking method and applying ideas from the UNESCO Sustainable Development Goal 4 in order to achieve “Equity in Education”. Recently, our project abstraction was published in the 2020-2021 STEM Fellowship Scientific Journal. Check out my GitHub for more information about this project.

projects.company: Graphical Data Sorting and Search Tool
projects.title: Creator
projects.description: In High School, I created this tool that graphically sorts and searches a list of random integers of any size using three sorting algorithms and a search algorithm that uses iteration and recursion. Check out my GitHub for more information about this project

projects.title: Creator
projects.description: This project is a react web app for students to use as a simple ToDo/Homework checklist. I created this project from scratch over the summer in High School for fun to begin learning React and JS. Check out my GitHub for more information about this project.
